name: File converter
description: Telegram Converter bot. Create your Fork now.

WEBHOOK.description: Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks when in env mode

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token, as a string.

SET_PASSWORD.description: Password for using this bot. If you don't set any password bot can be used as public

UPDATE_CHANNEL.description: Your Update Channel Username ( With Out @)

APP_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MytelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MytelegramOrg_Bot

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot @Mt_Id_Bot
